ygData.subject: Hail and well met.
ygData.msgSnippet: I am Thuxtis the Mighty, a gnomish warrior on the Rallos Zek server. I am currently 9th level, but expect to hit 10th before the end of the day. I chose to
ygData.messageBody:
I am Thuxtis the Mighty, a gnomish warrior on the Rallos Zek server.
I am currently 9th level, but expect to hit 10th before the end of the
day.

I chose to play a warrior because of the character I wanted to play, and
so make significant efforts to ignore the disadvantages of the class.

At my level, it is essential to group with others, especially on the PvP
server.
I believe the XP advantages (you go up faster) actually works against
you, with
the 4 level limit for Pvp, you advance into the prime PVP fodder more
wuickly than you can amass the items you need to protect you.

There is also the special ability that hits when you've taken 65%
damage, whoopee.

THings I would like to seen added to the class...
1. Increased magic resistance.
2. A Damage increase skill. Similar to the other skills in
advancement, this could act as a percentage multiplier to melee damage.
3. Improved Archery.
--
